channel.title: Used to host on my old computer, Windows 7 makes it harder lol
channel.description: This is a rookie question, but I am just messing around right now, i got java blah blah blah. When i compile i get [code]'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Used to host on my old computer, Windows 7 makes it harder lol
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

[quote=“WoodcutGuy, post:5, topic:371322”]Thanks it worked, but I am trying this InnovationX source (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456882.0.html) - the compiler worked, but when I run, I get Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'.

Spammed with that, do you know how to fix this aswell?
Note: It has SQL and I dont want that haha.[/quote]Damn Man… I Never Even Heard Of That Error Lol… I Been Coding 2-3 Years Now… Never Seen It Before Lol.

Read full topic

item.description:
@WoodcutGuy wrote:

Thanks it worked, but I am trying this InnovationX source (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456882.0.html) - the compiler worked, but when I run, I get Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Error: no `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\server\jvm.dll'.

Spammed with that, do you know how to fix this aswell?
Note: It has SQL and I dont want that haha.

item.title: Used to host on my old computer, Windows 7 makes it harder lol
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

[quote=“WoodcutGuy, post:3, topic:371322”]@echo off Title Compiler javac *.java pause[/quote]

Maybe you could try using this compile format, not sure if it will work but im on windows 7 and i was having the same problem, here it is,

@echo off title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java\jdk1.6.0_22/bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

And yea, just modify it how you please.

Read full topic
